tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoodNutritionalInfo (
  food_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  food_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  calories INT NOT NULL,
  protein FLOAT NOT NULL,
  carbs FLOAT NOT NULL,
  fats FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE food_items (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   calories INT,
   protein FLOAT,
   carbohydrates FLOAT,
   fats FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE dietary_requirements (
   user_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
   calories_required INT,
   protein_required FLOAT,
   carbohydrates_required FLOAT,
   fats_required FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE FoodItems ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name STRING, 
    calories INT, 
    protein FLOAT, 
    carbohydrates FLOAT, 
    fats FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE Meals ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    meal_date DATE, 
    meal_time TIME, 
    total_calories INT, 
    total_protein FLOAT, 
    total_carbohydrates FLOAT, 
    total_fats FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE Users ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name STRING, 
    age INT, 
    height FLOAT, 
    weight FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE UserMeals ( 
    user_id INT, 
    meal_id INT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, meal_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users (id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES Meals (id) 
);

CREATE TABLE FoodItems (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(100),
  calories INT,
  fat FLOAT,
  carbohydrates FLOAT,
  protein FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MealPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  date DATE,
  total_calories INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Meals (
  meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES MealPlans(plan_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES FoodItems(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DailyIntake (
  intake_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  date DATE,
  total_calories INT,
  total_fat FLOAT,
  total_carbohydrates FLOAT,
  total_protein FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);
